name: TOK-DAO
description:
TOK is a decentralized encrypted messenger  with over 10 million users. The community has achieved complete decentralized management. TOK Tokens already have many application scenarios, such as TOK-DAO to manage community violation pictures, etc. There are many ultra large  Public groups (100,000+   members), paid groups, TOK blog and other functions all need to use TOK's Tokens. TOK is both a functional Token and an equity Token.
 For details of TOK Fundraising Plan, please refer to TOK official website and Twitter, as well as TOK official group.
payDisclosure:
The price of TOK Tokens in the first phase is the lowest, and the contract is based on the number of TOK Tokens exchanged for 1 ETH. The amount of each ETH exchanged for TOK Tokens decreased gradually, and the decrease in each period is 20%. For example:
      1st Phase, 1 ETH can be exchanged for 1,000,000 TOK Tokens,
      2nd Phase, 1 ETH can be exchanged for 800,000 TOK Tokens,
      3rd Phase, 1 ETH can be exchanged for 640,000 TOK Tokens, and so on.
